backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining timeline, task, routine, cycle types, user profiles, access control, and build info, with storage mixins and event store scaffolding.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, and tests with high-confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of concise summaries for various frontend OmniTrace modules covering storage, analytics, UI, and session systems.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light and dark theme CSS variables and base layer rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up fonts and mounting the React app root.
frontend/PRODUCTION_PROMOTION.md: Production promotion checklist detailing deployment, cache clearing, URL verification, and build‑info validation steps.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling startup initialization, error recovery, screen routing, and session bootstrap.
frontend/src/constants/buildInfo.ts: Exports the frontend build label set to Version 8.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating authenticated or anonymous backend actors and invalidating dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBuildInfo.ts: React Query hook that fetches backend build info using the active actor with retry and refetch behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useStopwatch.ts: Implements a stopwatch hook with start, pause, reset, and elapsed‑time tracking using requestAnimationFrame.
frontend/src/hooks/useTimer.ts: Implements a countdown timer hook with start, pause, reset, duration control, and completion tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles, Tailwind layers, and custom themes including cognitive glow, focus ring, and timeline visual styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up React Query and the Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/omni/analytics/categoryBrea: Computes total and percentage duration per activity category from derived time segments.
frontend/src/omni/analytics/dailySummary: Generates daily insight summaries based on activity segments, detecting focus windows, distractions, rest patterns, and recovery gaps.
frontend/src/omni/analytics/driftDetecti: Analyzes activity events to detect cognitive drift, identifying focus decay patterns or distraction clustering.
frontend/src/omni/analytics/focusScore.t: Computes a 0–100 focus score from event-derived segments, adjusting for focus duration, distraction rate, rest balance, and switching behavior.
frontend/src/omni/analytics/heatmap.ts: Generates a time‑binned mental‑load heatmap based on segment overlap and category weights, then smooths intensity values.
frontend/src/omni/analytics/insights.ts: Derives insights such as most frequent activity, longest focus session, context switches, and peak productivity hour from segments and events.
frontend/src/omni/analytics/metrics.ts: Calculates session metrics including active, idle, background time, context switches, and focus density from ordered events.
frontend/src/omni/analytics/smartMerging: Merges raw segments into higher‑level cognitive patterns like Exploration Sessions, Micro‑Distractions, and Recovery Gaps based on mode-specific thresholds.
frontend/src/omni/analytics/titles.ts: Assigns gamified titles by evaluating long focus sessions, handling distractions, and exploration patterns using merged segments.
frontend/src/omni/engine/idleDetection.t: Detects idle and active states via user interactions and logs IDLE_START/IDLE_END events with timers.
frontend/src/omni/engine/queries.ts: Provides filtered event queries and nearest-event lookup using ledger storage functions.
frontend/src/omni/engine/timeEngine.ts: Derives activity segments from ordered events and supports querying which segment covers a given timestamp.
Builds a forensic timeline by querying events, deriving and merging segments, and detecting gaps between them.
frontend/src/omni/hooks/useCognitiveMode: Manages cognitive mode state with localStorage persistence and exposes a setter.
frontend/src/omni/hooks/useHeatmapZoom.t: Provides heatmap zoom state with wheel and pinch gesture handling and maps zoom levels to bin counts.
frontend/src/omni/hooks/useSmoothedFocus: Smoothly animates focus score and label changes using lerp unless reduced-motion is preferred.
frontend/src/omni/hooks/useTodayOmniEven: Loads today’s events with periodic refresh and exposes loading, error, and manual refresh control.
frontend/src/omni/instrumentation/contex: Stores and retrieves the current screen and mode for instrumentation context.
frontend/src/omni/instrumentation/logger: Creates and appends timestamped OmniEvents for logging actions.
frontend/src/omni/privacy/export.ts: Exports stored data to JSON or CSV by reading from IndexedDB and triggering file downloads.
frontend/src/omni/privacy/privateMode.ts: Tracks and persists a local private-mode flag with toggle and control helpers.
frontend/src/omni/privacy/wipe.ts: Provides full data wipe operations and recovery-safe database deletion, logging a wipe event first.
frontend/src/omni/search/index.ts: Runs event searches using time, category, confidence, keyword, and duration filters.
frontend/src/omni/search/presets.ts: Defines preset search filters for common anomaly queries such as idle or manual events.
frontend/src/omni/session/sessionTracker: Tracks session lifecycle and visibility changes, logging session and foreground/background events.
frontend/src/omni/session/startup.ts: Initializes storage, performs recovery, starts a new session, and activates the tracker.
frontend/src/omni/storage/idb.ts: Implements an IndexedDB storage layer with idempotent init, CRUD operations, and schema setup.
frontend/src/omni/storage/ledger.ts: Provides append and read helpers wrapping IndexedDB storage for event operations.
frontend/src/omni/storage/recovery.ts: Closes unclosed sessions on startup and logs a recovery event if needed.
frontend/src/omni/types.ts: Defines core OMNITRACE types including events, sessions, derived and merged segments, and export metadata.
frontend/src/omni/ui/AppShell.tsx: Implements the main app shell with navigation, focus score display, private mode, and cognitive mode controls.
frontend/src/omni/ui/categoryColors.ts: Defines color and label mappings for activity categories using OKLCH colors.
frontend/src/omni/ui/CognitiveModeSwitch: Provides a pill-style button group for switching between cognitive modes.
frontend/src/omni/ui/DailySummaryCard.ts: Renders a card showing daily insights from the analytics summary.
frontend/src/omni/ui/FocusScoreRing.tsx: Displays the focus score with animated ring styling and fallback for insufficient data.
frontend/src/omni/ui/HeatmapBar.tsx: Draws a horizontal heatmap on canvas using intensity-based OKLCH gradients.
frontend/src/omni/ui/HeatmapZoomControls: UI controls for adjusting heatmap zoom level via buttons and slider.
frontend/src/omni/ui/PrivateModeToggle.t: Provides a toggle button to enable or disable Private Mode.
frontend/src/omni/ui/States.tsx: Reusable components for loading, empty, inline notice, and startup error states.
frontend/src/omni/ui/timelineCognitiveSt: Computes cognitive styling values based on duration, category, and confidence, exposing CSS variable helpers.
frontend/src/omni/ui/TitlesStrip.tsx: Displays earned titles as badges with an icon when available.
frontend/src/screens/ActivityMapScreen.t: Displays an activity category breakdown over a selected date range using queried events and progress visuals.
frontend/src/screens/DashboardScreen.tsx: Generates session metrics, insights, titles, and summaries from events within a chosen date range.
frontend/src/screens/ForensicScreen.tsx: Reconstructs and displays detailed event timelines for a specified time window with expandable segment views.
frontend/src/screens/ManualEventDialog.t: Modal dialog for manually creating and storing events with category, timing, keywords, and notes.
frontend/src/screens/SearchScreen.tsx: Provides advanced search with filters, presets, and result listings for querying stored events.
frontend/src/screens/SettingsScreen.tsx: Implements privacy controls, data export/wipe actions, and frontend/backend build info display with version mismatch detection and refresh handling.
frontend/src/screens/StopwatchTimerScree: Provides stopwatch and timer tools with time formatting, duration inputs, and controls for start, pause, reset, and countdown.
frontend/src/screens/TimelineScreen.tsx: Displays a filterable timeline or heatmap of recorded events, supports cognitive modes, smart merging, manual event creation, and zoom controls.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers to read, store, persist, and clear URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the app’s UI styling.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing architecture, constraints, features, issues, and versioning for the OMNITRACE system.
